description: Ins and Outs: 100 meters at mile pace / 100 meters at 5k pace x 4 (400 meters total) x 8-12 laps, with 90-120 seconds of recovery between laps.
Hill Charges: 10 x 200m hill chargers at a hard, sustainable pace with a 200m easy jog/walk back recovery, plus 4 x 100m fun fast pickups on the recovery run back to the cars.
Social Run at the Niwot coffee shop.
